INTRODUCTION_NEW_USER.1: Hello, I am Biblo! I will be quizzing your mathematics skills!
INTRODUCTION_NEW_USER.2: You will be asked multiple choice questions based on simple mathematical concepts. Can you please tell me your name?
INTRODUCTION_NEW_USER.3: Hi {{NAME}}! Are you excited to learn today?

INTRODUCTION_RETURNING_USER.1: Hello, I am Biblo! I will be quizzing your mathematics skills!
INTRODUCTION_RETURNING_USER.2: Welcome back {{NAME}}! Are you excited to learn today?

TOPICS.1: Is there any particular topic you would like to be quizzed on. I can ask you questions on Algebra, Geometry, BODMAS
TOPICS.2: I didn't get that, shall we go ahead with General Questions?
TOPICS.3: Okay, we shall be studying {{TOPIC}} today

GENERAL_TALK: What would you like to talk about?

CORRECT_ANSWER: Well done! You got it right
INCORRECT_ANSWER: Not quite, let's come back to it later.
MANY_INCORRECT_ANSWERS: Take your time, no need to rush
ASK_FOR_HINT: Need a little nudge in the right direction?
Could I offer you a hint to assist you?
Feel free to ask for a hint if you need one.
In case you're stuck, I can provide a hint.
Could I offer a suggestion to help you along?
NEXT_QUESTION: Let's move on to the next question
Let's proceed to the following question.
Let's advance to the next question, shall we?
Now, let's delve into the next question.

UNCLEAR_DIALOGUE: I'm sorry, I didn't catch that.
Pardon me? Could you come again?
NO_DIALOGUE: Are you still there? Do you want to stop?
SESSION_END_DIALOGUE: You have reached the end of the session. You got {{CORRECT}} questions right and {{INCORRECT}} wrong. {{PERFORMANCE_SPECIFIC}}. Thanks and have a nice day! Goodbye

PERFORMANCE_SPECIFIC_DIALOGUE.1: You can do better, keep practising!
PERFORMANCE_SPECIFIC_DIALOGUE.2: You did well, but some more practice can definitely help you
PERFORMANCE_SPECIFIC_DIALOGUE.3: Well done! You have a good understanding of the topic
PERFORMANCE_SPECIFIC_DIALOGUE.5: Brilliant, you got them all right! Impressive!

PROMPTS.NAME: What is the name of the person saying the following? {{DIALOGUE}}
PROMPTS.YES_NO: Answer yes/no whether the following statement is affirmative? {{DIALOGUE}}
PROMPTS.TOPIC: What does the user want to study if they say the following? {{DIALOGUE}}
PROMPTS.COHERENT_DIALOGUE: Answer yes/no whether the following sentence is coherent. {{DIALOGUE}}
PROMPTS.EMOTION_DIALOGUE: The user got a mathematics question {{RIGHT/WRONG}} and is showing {{EMOTION}} emotion. Answer yes/no whether user needs a break?
PROMPTS.EMOTION_EXPRESSION: The user got a mathematics question {{RIGHT/WRONG}} and is showing {{EMOTION}} emotion. Please give a suitable facial expression out of the following: Smile, Frown, Sadness, Surprise, Curiosity.
PROMPTS.GENERAL_TALK: Give an appropriate response for when user says the following: {{DIALOGUE}}
